text: Ne odruzhuyutʹsya idolatresses yakshcho ne vony vvazhayutʹ; viryachyy zhintsi krashche nizh idolatress, navitʹ yakshcho vy lyubyte yiyi. Ne budete vy dayete vashi dochky u shlyubi idolatrous lyudyam, yakshcho ne vony vvazhayutʹ. Viryachyy lyudyni krashche nizh idolater, navitʹ yakshcho vy lyubyte yoho. Tsey zaproshuyutʹ do Didʹka, v toy chas, yak BOH zaproshuye do Rayu ta forgiveness, tomu shcho Vin wills. Vin roz'yasnyaye Yoho vidkryttya dlya lyudey, shcho vony mozhutʹ vzyaty uvahu
